dc.name: Batman
dc.desc: Batman is the superhero protector of Gotham City, a tortured, brooding vigilante dressed as a bat who fights against evil and strikes fear into the hearts of criminals everywhere.

dc.name: Wonder Woman
dc.desc: Princess Diana is Wonder Woman, the daughter of Hippolyta, Queen of the Amazons, and Zeus, the mightiest of the Gods of Olympus.

dc.name: Superman
dc.desc: Superman, also known as the Man of Steel. His abilities include incredible super-strength, super-speed, invulnerability, freezing breath, flight, and heat-vision.

marvel.name: Gambit
marvel.desc: Gambit belongs to a subspecies of humans called mutants, who are born with superhuman abilities. Gambit has the ability to mentally create, control, and manipulate pure kinetic energy to his desire.

marvel.name: Wolverine
marvel.desc: From the northern wilderness of Canada hails one of the gruffest, most irascible, totally cynical and brooding member of the X-Men ever to grace the team with his presence.

marvel.name: Hulk
marvel.desc: In his comic book appearances, the character is primarily represented by the alter ego Hulk, a green-skinned, hulking and muscular humanoid possessing a limitless degree of physical strength.
